name: Marechaussee Hunter
description:
After this character takes DMG or is healed: Based on the number of times this effect has been triggered this Round, the effects will be different.
First Trigger: Create 1 Elemental Die of this character's Elemental Type.
Second Trigger: Draw 1 card.
Fourth Trigger: Create 1 Elemental Die of this character's Elemental Type.
descriptionraw:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character takes DMG or is healed:</color> Based on the number of times this effect has been triggered this Round, the effects will be different.

<color=#FFFFFFFF>Second Trigger:</color> Draw 1 card.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Fourth Trigger:</color> Create 1 Elemental Die of this character's Elemental Type.
